description: This file defines a Flutter widget for displaying a list of notes with search functionality, allowing users to view, create, and navigate to individual note editing pages.

classes.name: NotesListPage
classes.description: Main screen widget displaying list of notes, with search bar and floating action button for creating new notes.

classes.name: _NotesListPageState
classes.description: State class for NotesListPage managing search, navigation, and list rendering.

classes.name: _EmptyState
classes.description: Stateless widget showing message when no notes are present.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the notes provider and search controller, sets up listener for search input.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of controllers and debouncer to free resources.

methods.name: _openEditorNew
methods.description: Navigates to the note editor page for creating a new note.

methods.name: _openEditorExisting
methods.description: Navigates to the note editor page for editing an existing note by ID.

methods.name: _buildSearchBar
methods.description: Builds the animated search bar widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main UI including app bar, list view, and action buttons.
